p.a: April 6, 2020: WLPS Learning and Technology Update
April 2, 2020: Buildings might be closed, but school is still in session!
March 19, 2020: Joint Statement from Washtenaw County Superintendents

hr.p: Questions? We’re here to help! Contact us at info@wlps.net or 734-839-6400.
